cards.name: Alert Shu Infantry
cards.text: Attacking doesn't cause Alert Shu Infantry to tap.

cards.name: Eightfold Maze
cards.text:
Play Eightfold Maze only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
Destroy any one attacking creature.

cards.name: Empty City Ruse
cards.text: Your opponent can't attack on his or her next turn.

cards.name: False Defeat
cards.text: Take any one creature card from your graveyard and put that creature into play.

cards.name: Flanking Troops
cards.text: When Flanking Troops attacks, you may tap any one creature. (Tapped creatures can't block.)

cards.name: Guan Yu, Sainted Warrior
cards.text:
Horsemanship
When Guan Yu is put into your graveyard from play, you may shuffle Guan Yu into your library.

cards.name: Guan Yu's 1,000-Li March
cards.text: Destroy all tapped creatures. (This includes your tapped creatures.)

cards.name: Huang Zhong, Shu General
cards.text: Huang Zhong can't be blocked by more than one creature each turn.

cards.name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
cards.text: All your other creatures get +1/+1 as long as Kongming is in play.

cards.name: Kongming's Contraptions
cards.text: After you're attacked, before you declare blockers, you may tap Kongming's Contraptions to have it deal 2 damage to any one attacking creature.

cards.name: Liu Bei, Lord of Shu
cards.text:
Horsemanship
As long as you have Guan Yu and/or Zhang Fei in play, Liu Bei gets +2/+2.

cards.name: Loyal Retainers
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack you may put Loyal Retainers in your graveyard to take any one Legend card from your graveyard and put that creature into play.

cards.name: Misfortune's Gain
cards.text: Destroy any one creature. That creature's owner gains 4 life.

cards.name: Pang Tong, "Young Phoenix"
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Pang Tong to give any one creature +0/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Peach Garden Oath
cards.text: For each creature you have in play, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Rally the Troops
cards.text:
Play Rally the Troops only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
Untap all your creatures.

cards.name: Ravages of War
cards.text: Destroy all lands. (This includes your lands.)

cards.name: Riding Red Hare
cards.text: Any one creature gets +3/+3 and gains horsemanship until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Shu Cavalry
cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Shu Defender
cards.text: When Shu Defender blocks, it gets +0/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Shu Elite Companions
cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Shu Farmer
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Shu Farmer to gain 1 life.

cards.name: Shu General
cards.text:
Horsemanship
Attacking doesn't cause Shu General to tap.

cards.name: Shu Grain Caravan
cards.text: When Shu Grain Caravan comes into play, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Shu Soldier-Farmers
cards.text: When Shu Soldier-Farmers comes into play, you gain 4 life.

cards.name: Vengeance
cards.text: Destroy any one tapped creature.

cards.name: Virtuous Charge
cards.text: All your creatures get +1/+1 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Warrior's Stand
cards.text:
Play Warrior's Stand only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
All your creatures get +2/+2 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Zhang Fei, Fierce Warrior
cards.text:
Horsemanship
Attacking doesn't cause Zhang Fei to tap.

cards.name: Zhao Zilong, Tiger General
cards.text:
Horsemanship
When Zhao Zilong blocks, it gets +1/+1 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Balance of Power
cards.text: If you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent does, you draw until you have the same number. (When you play Balance of Power it doesn't count as in your hand.)

cards.name: Borrowing 100,000 Arrows
cards.text: For each tapped creature your opponent has in play, you draw a card.

cards.name: Brilliant Plan
cards.text: Draw three cards.

cards.name: Broken Dam
cards.text: Tap any one or two creatures without horsemanship. (Tapped creatures can't block.)

cards.name: Capture of Jingzhou
cards.text: You take another turn after this one.

cards.name: Champion's Victory
cards.text:
Play Champion's Victory only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers.
Return any one attacking creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Council of Advisors
cards.text: When Council of Advisors comes into play, draw a card.

cards.name: Counterintelligence
cards.text: Return any one or two creatures to their owner's hand.

cards.name: Exhaustion
cards.text: At the beginning of your opponent's next turn, he or she skips untapping creatures and lands.

cards.name: Extinguish
cards.text:
Play Extinguish only in response to another player playing a sorcery.
That sorcery has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Forced Retreat
cards.text: Return any one creature from play to the top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Lady Sun
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Lady Sun to return it and any one other creature to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Lu Meng, Wu General
cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Lu Su, Wu Advisor
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Lu Su to draw a card.

cards.name: Lu Xun, Scholar General
cards.text:
Horsemanship
When Lu Xun successfully damages your opponent, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Mystic Denial
cards.text: Play Mystic Denial only in response to another player playing a creature or a sorcery. That card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Preemptive Strike
cards.text:
Play Preemptive Strike only in response to another player playing a creature card.
That creature has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Red Cliffs Armada
cards.text: Red Cliffs Armada can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.

cards.name: Sage's Knowledge
cards.text: Return any one sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Strategic Planning
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Sun Ce, Young Conquerer
cards.text:
Horsemanship
When Sun Ce comes into play, you may return any one creature from play to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
cards.text: All your creatures gain horsemanship as long as Sun Quan is in play. (This includes Sun Quan.)

cards.name: Wu Admiral
cards.text: As long as your opponent has an island in play, Wu Admiral gets +1/+1.

cards.name: Wu Elite Cavalry
cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Wu Light Cavalry
cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Wu Longbowman
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Wu Longbowman to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Wu Scout
cards.text:
Horsemanship
When Wu Scout comes into play, look at your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Wu Spy
cards.text: When Wu Spy comes into play, look at the top two cards of any player's library. Put one of them on the top of that player's library and the other in his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Wu Warship
cards.text: Wu Warship can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.

cards.name: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander
cards.text: Zhou Yu can't attack unless your opponent has an island in play.

cards.name: Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Zhuge Jin to make any one creature unblockable this turn.

cards.name: Ambition's Cost
cards.text: Draw three cards. You lose 3 life.

cards.name: Cao Cao, Lord of Wei
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Cao Cao to force your opponent to choose and discard two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)

cards.name: Cao Ren, Wei Commander
cards.text:
Horsemanship
When Cao Ren comes into play, you lose 3 life.

cards.name: Coercion
cards.text: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent discards that card.

cards.name: Corrupt Court Official
cards.text: When Corrupt Official comes into play, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any cards.)

cards.name: Cunning Advisor
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Cunning Advisor to force your opponent to choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

cards.name: Deception
cards.text: Your opponent chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)

cards.name: Desperate Charge
cards.text: All your creatures get +2/+0 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Famine
cards.text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and player. (This includes your creatures and you.)

cards.name: Ghostly Visit
cards.text: Destroy any one creature that isn't black.

cards.name: Imperial Edict
cards.text: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Destroy that creature.

cards.name: Imperial Seal
cards.text: Search your library for any one card. Shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

cards.name: Overwhelming Forces
cards.text: Destroy all your opponent's creatures. you draw a card for each creature destroyed in this way.

cards.name: Poison Arrow
cards.text: Destroy any one creature that isn't black. You gain 3 life.

cards.name: Return to Battle
cards.text: Return any one creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Sima Yi, Wei Field Marshal
cards.text: Sima Yi has power equal to the number of swamp cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped swamp cards.)

cards.name: Stolen Grain
cards.text: Stolen Grain deals 5 damage to your opponent. You gain 5 life.

cards.name: Stone Catapult
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Stone Catapult to destroy any one tapped creature that isn't black.

cards.name: Wei Ambush Force
cards.text: When Wei Ambush Force attacks, it gets +2/+0 until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Wei Assassins
cards.text: When Wei Assassins comes into play, your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Destroy that creature. (Ignore this effect if your opponent has no creatures in play.)

cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Wei Night Raiders

Horsemanship

cards.name: Wei Strike Force
cards.text: Horsemanship

cards.name: Young Wei Recruits

Horsemanship

cards.text: Swampwalk (If defending player has a swamp in play, Zodiac Pig can't be blocked.)

cards.text: Swampwalk (If defending player has a swamp in play, Zodiac Rat can't be blocked.)

cards.text: Swampwalk (If defending player has a swamp in play, Zodiac Snake can't be blocked.)

cards.text: Blaze deals X damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Burning Fields
cards.text: Burning Fields deals 5 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Burning of Xinye
cards.text: You destroy four of your lands and your opponent destroys four of his or her lands. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)

cards.name: Control of the Court
cards.text: Draw four cards and put them into your hand. Then discard three cards at random from your hand.

cards.name: Corrupt Eunuchs
cards.text: When Corrupt Eunuchs comes into play, it deals 2 damage to any one creature. (If you're the only one with creatures, deal the damage to one of them.)

cards.name: Desert Sandstorm
cards.text: Desert Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)

cards.name: Diaochan, Artful Beauty
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Diaochan to destroy any one creature. Then, your opponent destroys any one creature of his or her choice.

cards.name: Dong Zhou, the Tyrant
cards.text: When Dong Zhou comes into play, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature deals damage to him or her equal to its power. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any creatures in play.)

cards.name: Eunuchs' Intrigues
cards.text: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Only that creature can block this turn.

cards.name: Fire Ambush
cards.text: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Fire Bowman
cards.text: On your turn, before you attack, you may destroy Fire Bowman to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.

cards.name: Imperial Recruiter
cards.text: When Imperial Recruiter comes into play, search your library for a creature card with power no greater than 2, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterward.

cards.text:
Horsemanship

cards.name: Ma Chao, Western Warrior

Horsemanship

cards.name: Mountain Bandit
cards.text: Mountain Bandit is unaffected by summoning sickness.

cards.name: Ravaging Horde
cards.text: When Ravaging Horde comes into play, destroy any one land.

cards.name: Relentless Assault
cards.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. You may declare an additional attack this turn.

cards.name: Renegade Troops
cards.text: Renegade Troops is unaffected by summoning sickness.

cards.name: Rockslide Ambush
cards.text: Rockslide Ambush deals to any one creature damage equal to the number of mountain cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped mountain cards.)

cards.name: Rolling Earthquake
cards.text: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each player and each creature without horsemanship. (This includes you and your creatures without horsemanship.)

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy any one land.

cards.name: Warrior's Oath
cards.text: Take another turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game. (You don't lose if you've already won.)

cards.text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature each turn.
